name: Localsecuritypolicy
tagline: Windows Local Security Policy Powershell Module
body:
Powershell cmdlets to edit the Windows Local Security Policy

###Installation

download both the PSM1 and PSD1 files. Import the PSD1.

###Notes    
RawCode folder contains the individual raw code.

[Back to Home](http://jeffbuenting.github.io)
